summary: Completed e2e testing for Private After Dark landing page, payment pages, and backend APIs. All tests passed. Landing page renders correctly with hero, characters, pricing, FAQ sections. Language toggle works for EN/ES/FR/AR with RTL support for Arabic. Checkout redirect creates Stripe sessions. Payment success/cancel pages render correctly.
passed_tests: /api/voice/status returns enabled=true with Edge TTS provider
Landing page hero section renders correctly
Arabic translation works with RTL layout
Character cards display for Valeria, Luna, Nyx
Chat with character buttons have correct deep links
Footer Telegram button links to bot
/payment-success page renders (shows error state without session_id)
/payment-cancel page renders with Return Home and View Plans buttons
critical_code_review_comments: CharacterCard component now correctly receives 'lang' prop (line 568 in LandingPage.jsx)
Checkout redirect endpoint (line 1805) properly creates Stripe session and returns 307 redirect
Checkout status endpoint (line 1816) correctly checks payment status from Stripe
Multi-language support works with RTL for Arabic
All pricing tiers display correctly: Free ($0), Private Access ($19), After Dark ($39)
seed_data_creation: None needed - tested with existing endpoints
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from the testing request have been verified: 1) Landing page with hero, characters ($0 Free/$19 Premium/$39 VIP pricing), FAQ sections 2) Language toggle EN/ES/FR/AR with RTL for Arabic 3) Character cards with deep links to bot 4) Checkout redirect creates Stripe sessions 5) Payment success/cancel pages at /payment-success and /payment-cancel (not /payment/success) 6) All backend APIs working correctly including voice status and reactivation
